rows.description: If you get minimal or no exercise
rows.name: Sedentary

rows.description: If you exercise moderately three to five days a week
rows.name: Lightly active

rows.description: If you exercise moderately three to five days a week
rows.name: Moderately active

rows.description: If you engage in hard exercise six to seven days a week
rows.name: Very active

rows.description: If you engage in very hard exercise six to seven days a week or have a physical job
rows.name: Extra active
